dict.acceptation: 伤；伤害；“wind”的过去式和过去分词；

sent.orig: The present invention is especially suitable for making wound plate and battery with wound structure.
sent.trans: 本发明工艺尤其适用于卷绕式极板及制造卷绕式结构的电池。

sent.orig: Conclusion Emu oil can alleviate inflammation in the scald wound and promote wound healing in rats.
sent.trans: 结论鸸鹋油对创面无明显疼痛刺激作用，可减轻烧伤创面炎症反应，促进创面的愈合。

sent.orig: Tony's wound is at competition time from the very beginning a regulation, wound to Achilles tendon.
sent.trans: 托尼的伤是在比赛一开始的时候被犯规，伤到了跟腱。

sent.orig: The surgeon opened up the wound up the wound and got the bullet out.
sent.trans: 医生切开了伤口，取出了子弹。

sent.orig: Study and development of wound dressings is a important field in burn wound healing.
sent.trans: 创面覆盖物的开发和应用是烧伤创面修复研究中的重点。
